title: Sarong, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, mica
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: Woven striped sarong in brown, light brown, cream-white, and blue. Embroidered in an all-over pattern of alternating geometric, organic patterned, and plain stripes with mica pieces added.

Sarong, 19th century.Medium: cotton, mica
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. 1961-115-15.
